name: Procedural Theft Auto
description:
Procedural Theft Auto is a single player game based on the well known Grand Theft Auto series that implements procedural generation. The game was developed by Sam Gallacher as an Honours Project in Computer Game Applications Devlopment at Abertay University through year 2020/2021. 

The game's primary focus is its implemented procedural generation techniques. The city, missions and vehicles are all procedurally generated - so, every time you play, a new and unique experience is waiting. Drive around, play missions, earn money and get yourself over to the garage and buy some high-end cars!

Procedural Theft Auto is a PC-only game, compatible with mouse and keyboard.
